name: Horatio Salt and the Book of the Dead
name_original: Horatio Salt and the Book of the Dead
description:
Its bound in human flesh, inked in blood and currently residing in Little Bunton village library. Somewhere between an Idiots guide to self-confidence and Yoga for the over 90's... Evil Abounds! Join Horatio Salt in a race against malevolent forces intent on releasing the ultimate Evil! Evil TBC at a later date.  

Made for Adventure Jam 2017

Java game
